{autor} {sep} {icon_github} {icon_twitter} {icon_instagram} ", "{icon_mastodon} {icon_bsky} {usuario}" ) ``` ::: ## Datos ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2025, 52) christmas_novel_authors <- tuesdata$christmas_novel_authors christmas_novel_text <- tuesdata$christmas_novel_text christmas_novels <- tuesdata$christmas_novels ``` ::: ## Procesamiento Me interesa... ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} d2 <- christmas_novel_authors |> filter(!str_detect(author, "Finley")) |> select(gutenberg_author_id, author, wikipedia) |> separate_wider_delim( cols = author, delim = ", ", names = c("apellido", NA), cols_remove = TRUE ) |> drop_na() |> mutate(wikipedia = str_remove(wikipedia, "\\|(.*)")) |> mutate( wikipedia = if_else( apellido == "Mitchell", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Silas_Weir_Mitchell_(physician)", wikipedia ) ) |> mutate(apellido = if_else(apellido == "Van Dyke", "Dyke", apellido)) f_img <- function(gutenberg_author_id, apellido, wikipedia) { l <- rvest::read_html(wikipedia) |> rvest::html_elements("img") |> as.character() link <- l[str_detect(string = l, pattern = apellido)] |> pluck(1) |> rvest::minimal_html() |> rvest::html_elements("img") |> rvest::html_attr("src") if (length(link) == 0) { return(NULL) } else { return(tibble(id = gutenberg_author_id, link = paste0("https:", link))) } } d_img <- pmap(d2, f_img) |> list_c() ``` ::: ## Figura Figura. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} d <- inner_join( christmas_novel_authors, d_img, by = join_by(gutenberg_author_id == id) ) |> inner_join(christmas_novels, by = join_by(gutenberg_author_id)) |> select(author, birthdate, deathdate, title, link, gutenberg_author_id) |> mutate(author = str_remove(author, " \\(.*\\)")) |> mutate(author = str_replace(author, "(.*),", "**\\1**,")) |> mutate(title = str_wrap(title, width = 40)) |> mutate(title = glue("{title}
")) |> mutate(title = str_replace_all(title, "\\n", "
")) |> mutate(title = glue("\\- {title}")) |> reframe( label = str_flatten(title, collapse = ""), .by = c(author, birthdate, deathdate, link, gutenberg_author_id) ) |> arrange(author) %>% mutate(x = rep(1:3, length.out = nrow(.))) %>% mutate(y = rep(10:1, each = 3, length.out = nrow(.))) |> mutate(link = glue("")) |> mutate(años = glue("({birthdate}-{deathdate})")) # inner_join( # christmas_novels, # christmas_novel_text, # by = join_by(gutenberg_id), # relationship = "many-to-many" # ) |> # inner_join(d, by = join_by(gutenberg_author_id)) |> # drop_na() |> # count(text, gutenberg_id) |> # slice_max(order_by = n, n = 1, by = gutenberg_id, with_ties = FALSE) |> # print(n = 100) g <- ggplot(d, aes(x, y)) + geom_richtext( aes(label = link), fill = NA, label.color = NA, hjust = 1, vjust = 1 ) + geom_richtext(aes(label = author), hjust = 0, vjust = 1) + geom_richtext( aes(y = y - .2, label = años), hjust = 0, vjust = 1, size = 3, fill = NA, family = "jet" ) + geom_richtext( aes(y = y - .4, label = label), hjust = 0, vjust = 1, family = "ubuntu", size = 3, label.color = NA, fill = NA ) + geom_point(size = 2) + coord_cartesian(xlim = c(.75, 4), expand = FALSE, clip = "off") + theme_void(base_family = "ubuntu", base_size = 15) + theme_sub_plot( margin = margin(b = 40), background = element_rect(fill = "white") ) ggsave( plot = g, filename = "tidytuesday/2025/semana_52.png", width = 30, height = 30, units = "cm" ) browseURL("tidytuesday/2025/semana_52.png") ``` ::: Guardo. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggsave( plot = g, filename = "tidytuesday/2025/semana_52.png", width = 30, height = 30, units = "cm" ) browseURL("tidytuesday/2025/semana_52.png") ``` :::
